item.title: 2023 Events
item.description: Programs Tuesday afternoons and evenings: High Power Practice Wednesday afternoons and evenings: Schuetzen Practice Thursday: Silhouette Practice Competitions Date Event April 29th NRA 4-gun (600) Entry Form (PDF; p1) April 30th NRA OTC Entry Form (PDF; p2) July 1st NRA OTC Entry Form (DOC July 2nd CMP EIC Entry Form (PDF) September 2-3rd NRA 4-gun (600) Entry Form (PDF) September 23rd NRA 4-gun (600) Entry Form (PDF; p1) September 24th NRA OTC Entry Form (PDF; p2) Deer Sight-in Clinic Dates TBD

item.title: Club Information
item.description: Contact tzemaitis66@gmail.com Documents ECNRC Standard Operating Procedures (PDF) Membership Application (PDF) Location 8768 North Shore Drive Eau Claire, WI 54703 Directions From Highway 53, head East on County ‘Q’ for ~6 miles Turn right on County ‘QQ’ and head South for ~2 miles The range will be on your right after a sharp right curve Lat. N44 48.908’ Long. W91 20.732’ Map
